title: DAY IN MY LIFE AT THE FARM! Part 1

tasks.task: Performing morning routine and walking dogs
subtasks: Waking up early in the morning (7 AM)
Feeding cats and dogs
Walking the dogs and interacting with them
Preparing breakfast and getting dressed
Loading and unloading vehicles
Dealing with cold weather conditions

tasks.task: Checking and maintaining farm water lines
subtasks: Locating a broken water line
Shutting off the well to prevent water spillage
Cutting and replacing the water line
Securing the new water line with a cuplink
Observing and interacting with bunnies
Checking on a sad bunny and considering taking it home
Deworming horses
Feeding horses and distributing hay
Unloading and managing hay delivery
Finding the location to temporarily keep the found dogs
Posting about the found dogs on local pet finder
Retrieving garbage bags from Home Depot
Purchasing snacks during a long drive
Transporting shavings back from Lake City
Unloading shavings onto the farm
Storing the shavings for farm use

tasks.task: "Checking and maintaining farm water lines," with subtasks like locating the leak, shutting the well, cutting/replacing pipe, and securing it.

Then, there's mention of taking care of farm animals, like observing bunnies, checking on a sad bunny, deworming horses, and distributing hay. So "Assisting with farm animal care" could be the MAINTASK here, with subtasks like checking on bunnies, grooming/tending to them, deworming horses, feeding and managing hay.

Lastly, they're unloading the shavings transported from Lake City and distributing them. That’s another "Unloading and distributing shavings" MAINTASK with subtasks like transporting, unloading, and storing.

So putting it all together. Starting with MAINTASK of performing morning routine and walking dogs, having subtasks of waking up, feeding and walking the animals. Then traveling to the farm with subtasks of vehicle loading/unloading and dealing with weather. Maintenance tasks like fixing water lines, assisting with animal care, managing found dogs, and performing errands for the farm.
followed by subtasks. Each subtask under a MAINTASK. Then another MAINTASK if there are multiple main categories. Finally, a reason why the video is acceptable, that it's about farming.
